item.title: CEO of $90 billion Waste Management hauled trash and went to 1 a.m. safety briefings—‘It’s not always just dollars and cents’
item.description: Jim Fish took his father-in-law’s advice and attended early-morning safety meetings to meet with workers, ride in truck cabs, and talk about whatever ...

item.title: Bridgewater, D.E. Shaw among top hedge fund gainers of 2025
item.description: Michel Massoud’s event-driven Melqart Opportunities Fund surged 45%, and Citadel’s flagship hedge fund posted a 10.2% increase in 2025.

item.title: Cash machines in this former communist country issue euros for the first time after becoming the 21st member of the currency union
item.description: The country of nearly 6.7 million people was one of the poorest when it first became a member of the European Union in 2007.

item.title: This is the next Trump construction project, joining the White House ballroom, Rose Garden replacement and others
item.description: The Courses at Andrews — inside the secure confines of Joint Base Andrews in Maryland — are known as the “president's golf course."

item.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy flirts again with the danger threshold at which his company is worth less than his Bitcoin
item.description: Why hold a stock that is worth less than the underlying asset it represents?
